div.head: Ripe Tomato Pickle
div.p: Take ripe Tomatos Tomatoes and pick them with a fork or a pointed stick put them into any kind of vessel salt each layer Thickly let them remain in the salt about eight days at the expiration of the eight days put them for one night in a vessel of vinagar vinegar and water them to a peck of tomatos and a bottle of good mustard put half an ounce of cloves falf an ounce of pepper and a dosen dozen large onions sliced pack there in a jar placing a layer of onions and spices between the layers of Toma ten days the pickles will be in good eating order
